skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: With a keen eye for design and proficiency in modern front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I craft engaging and responsive user interfaces that elevate user experiences.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: As a back-end developer, I architect and implement robust server-side solutions using languages like Python and frameworks like Django, ensuring seamless functionality and performance for web applications

skills.title: Data Analysis
skills.description: With expertise in data analysis tools like Python's Pandas and visualization libraries like Matplotlib, I uncover valuable insights and patterns from complex datasets, empowering informed decision-making and strategic planning

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: Combining creativity with a deep understanding of user behavior, I design intuitive and visually appealing interfaces that prioritize user experience, leveraging tools like Adobe XD and Figma to bring concepts to life

portfolio.title: Visual Basic
portfolio.description: My experience with visual basic is its simplicity and power, especially when coupled with the robust development environment provided by Visual Studio.

portfolio.title: Java
portfolio.description: My expertise in Java empowers me to develop robust and scalable applications, combining innovation with reliability to tackle complex challenges with confidence

portfolio.title: Javascript
portfolio.description: From crafting dynamic web experiences to building powerful server-side applications with Node.js, JavaScript's versatility and ubiquity make it an essential tool in my developer toolkit.

portfolio.title: HTML + CSS
portfolio.description: Proficient in HTML and CSS, I bring web designs to life with clean, responsive code, ensuring seamless user experiences across all platforms

portfolio.title: Python
portfolio.description: With a solid foundation in Python, I've crafted elegant and efficient solutions, leveraging its versatility for everything from data analysis to web development

testimonial.description: Choosing Khanya for our software development needs was the best decision we made. His professionalism, technical proficiency, and commitment to understanding our requirements ensured the smooth execution of our project. We're thrilled with the results and look forward to future collaborations

I couldn't be happier with the software solutions provided by Khanya Somagaca. His team's innovative approach and seamless development process made our project a success. I highly recommend his services to anyone seeking top-notch software development expertise.

Working with Khanya was a game-changer for our project! His expertise in software development not only met but exceeded our expectations. His attention to detail and dedication to delivering a high-quality product were truly impressive
